page.title: 14Interview at Village Shop.
page.content: We went to see the village shop in Baston which sells nearly everything we want.The shop keeper has always lived here.It is now owned by her brother from Baston. First it used to be a bakery then a small shop and Post Office. When her brother took over the shop he knocked a wall down to make the shop bigger. Every Wednesday the shop keeper goes and gets the shops stock. She gets most things from the cah and carry in Peterborough. If she is ill or goes on holiday her sister-in-law looks after the shop for her. She likes Baston because she knows all her customers and they are friendly.
